dmca.title: ThePlanetAbuse-C3601246Y] Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 23, 2007 8:46 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3601246Y] Cease and Desist

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Cease and Desist
Added by system at Friday, Mar 23 2007 01:35 pm 
X-MailFrom: wendyw@onlinelegalmarketing.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Mar 23 13:35:42 2007 
Received: (qmail 24542 invoked by alias); 23 Mar 2007 18:35:42 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net

  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 23 Mar 2007 18:35:41 -0000

Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Fri, 23 Mar 2007 13:35:41 -0500 
Return-path: <wendyw@onlinelegalmarketing.com> 
Delivery-date: Fri, 23 Mar 2007 13:35:41 -0500

helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)

 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim) 
        id 1HUoc1-0007c3-0E 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 23 Mar 2007 13:35:41 -0500 
Received: from mail2.dataservicesltd.com ([64.69.95.12]) 
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
wendyw@onlinelegalmarketing.com) 
        with smtp (Exim) 
        id 1HUobz-000HwU-SV 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 23 Mar 2007 13:35:40 -0500 
Received: (qmail 7173 invoked from network); 23 Mar 2007 18:35:23 -0000 
Received: from s01060011437186be.gv.shawcable.net (HELO Wendy)
(24.108.13.89) 
  by glycol.ezprovider.net with SMTP; 23 Mar 2007 18:35:23 -0000 
From: "Wendy Wurtele" <wendyw@onlinelegalmarketing.com> 
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, 
        <copyright@theplanet.com>, 
        <legal-response@theplanet.com> 
Subject: Cease and Desist 
Date: Fri, 23 Mar 2007 11:34:50 -0700 
Message-ID: <002301c76d7a$009e98e0$6501a8c0@Wendy> 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; 
        boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0024_01C76D3F.543FC0E0" 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
Thread-Index: AcdtXxeWzD2elZThTmuyl+rHaAuNhg== 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 23 Mar 2007 18:35:41.0331 (UTC)
FILETIME=[0F4A3E30:01C76D7A] 

 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sirs,   
 
  
 
Note: you have previously taken down this site for the same illegal
copying 
in January 2007. 
 
You have now allowed it to go up again. 
 
Please take immediate action and do not allow it to re-appear again, or
we, 
and the many law firms involved in having their ads displayed by Yahoo
on 
this illegal site, will take legal action. 
 
  
 
  
 
   
 
It appears that a website apparently hosted with you, is infringing our 
copyright and copying content from our website onto their urls.   
 
   
 
Not only have they copied our website, they are making money off our
content 
by putting Yahoo ads on this illegal website. 
 
  
 
  
 
The abusing url is:   
 
www.forbestlaw.com  
 
  
 
Site IP: 70.87.178.18 
 
  
 
  
 
They have copied content from our website www.lawyersandsettlements.com

 
  
 
It looks like about 95 percent of the content on these websites is a
direct  
 
copy of our pages.  
 
  
 
Here are examples of their copyright infringement.  
 
  
 
You can see if you look up the WHOIS that they put this website up in 
Nov-2006.  
 
Their content is an EXACT copy from our website.  
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/ssri_birth_defects  
 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/ssri_birth_defects.html  
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/ace_inhibitors  
 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/ace_inhibitors.html   
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/asbestos_mesothelioma

 
  
 
Infringing URL:
http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/asbestos_mesothelioma.html   
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/benzene  
 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/benzene.html   
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/california_labor_law

 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/california_labor_law.html

 
  
 
  
 
Our URL:  
 
http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/cell_phone_early_termination_f
ees  
 
  
 
Infringing URL:  
 
http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/cell_phone_early_termination_fees.html   
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/cerebral_palsy  
 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/cerebral_palsy.html  
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/kugel-mesh  
 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/kugel-mesh.html   
 
  
 
  
 
Our URL: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/warfarin  
 
  
 
Infringing URL: http://www.forbestlaw.com/case/warfarin.html   
 
  
 
  
 
Please shut them down immediately.  
 
  
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described  
 
above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my registered  
 
copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the  
 
information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright

 
owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.  
 
  
 
  
 
Sincerely  
 
  
 
Scott and Wendy Wurtele  
 
Online Legal Marketing Ltd.  
 
Justice for Everyone  
 
www.OnlineLegalMarketing.com   
 
www.LawyersandSettlements.com
